description.value:
This staff of magically hardened wood is topped with a silver sculpture depicting magical runic symbols. When used as a weapon, a staff of power is a +2 greater striking staff.

Voluntarily destroying a staff of power unleashes an incredible blast of energy. When wielding the staff, you can Interact to break it. This releases a @Template[type:burst|distance:30] magical explosion centered on the staff. This deals @Damage[2d8[force]] damage per charge remaining in the staff (@Check[type:reflex|dc:40|basic:true]). You automatically critically fail your save. A creature reduced to 0 Hit Points by this damage dies instantly; this is a death effect.

Activate Cast a Spell

Effect You expend a number of charges from the staff to cast a spell from its list.

  • 1st @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Enfeeble]
  • 2nd @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Everlight]
  • 3rd @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Levitate]
  • 4th @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Dispelling Globe], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Paralyze]
  • 5th @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Force Barrage]
  • 6th @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Wall of Force]
  • 7th @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Cone of Cold], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Fireball], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Lightning Bolt]

Craft Requirements Supply one casting of all listed levels of all listed spells.
